oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1959-03-28 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from March 28, 1959. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ray Price (host/performer), guest performer Kitty Wells, and regular performers Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, the Jordanaires, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1016th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ray Price; Archie Campbell; Kitty Wells; Tommy Jackson; Jordanaires; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ray Price -- Crazy Arms (Ray Price) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Kitty Wells -- Mommy For A Day (Kitty Wells) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ray Price) -- Ray Price introduces Tommy Jackson -- Katy Hill (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ray Price talks -- Peace In The Valley (Ray Price, Jordanaires) -- Ray Price introduces Chet Atkins -- Hello Bluebird (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Atkins, Chet; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Campbell, Archie; Sloan, Ralph; Tennessee Travelers; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Cherokee Cowboys (Musical group); Wells, Kitty
